page.title: 09CHILDREN'S PASTIMES
page.content: I enjoy doing Break Dance very much... but the problem is that some of the moves are very difficult.Break Dance is the newest craze.It requires lots of skill and strength.Some moves are quite easy such as 'Caterpillar' (forwards and backwards).Some of the hardest moves are the 'Windmill', 'Head-spin','Handglide','Backspin' and 'Flapjack'. Bulldog is my favourite playground game.I like it because there is a lot of running to do and it gives me a bit of exercise.Somebody is 'it' and there is a semi-circle at the top of the playground and one at the bottom.You run from one semi-circle to the other without getting caught. The first person to get caught is 'it' in the next game.
